text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: We did iiit! Yes, we're the beeest!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: All right, all right. Are you going todo that every time we finish a song?Let's get on with the next onealready.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes, let's. I'm glad both of you are<n>brimming with
motivation. We're<n>almost ready for the commemorative<n>
concert, so let's keep up the pace.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Taishin! We have to do our<n>best!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see the BNW trio are in high spirits!<n>But the Robot, Rose,
and I will not lose!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Bourbon, are you really okay with<n>being called a robot?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Classification accepted. "Robot"<n>forms an alliterative pair
with your<n>"Rose," and is both brief and<n>identifiable.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, you two, let's go! RRI, hoorah!
